description: This file defines a utility class ApiRequestContextHolder for managing thread-local API request context within a Java application. It provides static methods to get, set, and clear the context specific to each thread.

classes.name: ApiRequestContextHolder
classes.description: Utility class for managing thread-local API request context, providing static methods for context retrieval and management.

methods.name: clearContext
methods.description: Removes the ApiRequestContext associated with the current thread.

methods.name: getContext
methods.description: Retrieves the current thread's ApiRequestContext; creates and associates a new one if none exists.
